channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-docstring-checker (1.2)
item.description: A simple flake8 plugin that checks if everything has a docstring
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-gl-codeclimate (0.2.1)
item.description: Gitlab Code Quality artifact Flake8 formatter.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations (3)
item.description: Flake8 Type Annotation Checks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-executable (2.1.3)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin for checking executable permissions and shebangs.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-future-annotations (1.1)
item.description: Verifies python 3.7+ files use from __future__ import annotations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.1.20)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.1.20)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-debug (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to forbid debug function usage
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.1.17)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: ignore-flake8-error (0.1)
item.description: add `noqa` comments to ignore every occurrence of a flake8 error
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.

item.title: Updated: flake8-in-file-ignores (0.2.2)
item.description: file-level per-file-ignores for flake8
